name: D
comment: TO PUT Taiwan’s pride in containing the virus since last year INTO PERSPECTIVE, as you realize both as island nations with relatively low total vaccinations administered thus far, New Zealand’s humble attitude and cautious approach have made their success more sustainable in the long run. IMAGINE “Taiwan Can Help”, LET’S SAY Taiwan was invited to join WHO, FOR INSTANCE, the whole world follows the Taiwan model in managing the pandemic situation being misguided by the Taiwanese CDC to believe that there’s no hurry to be vaccinated and how would the world have been able to catch up to Taiwan’s level, actually don’t even go there...TO GIVE YOU AN IDEA how double standards have been applied while Ray should be held accountable for pretending nothing is happening and not making a video titled Taiwan Needs Help in response to the Taiwan Can Help video, so hopefully the world instead can actually help save more lives from being lost in Taiwan. Thank you.

name: 莉
comment: 我想請教一下，我以為的For examples 是”I want some drinks, for example coke or lemon tea”，所以影片開始前我想了一下會有such as, just like，可是影片後面給的例子感覺不是一般在說的「例如」而是「換個說法」，比較像是which。我想請教的是，所以I need at least 3000mg of caffeine to function each day. For example, that’ll be around 30 cups of coffee. 這樣也是通用的嗎？因為自己的英文文法沒學好，平常都是唸起來順口就好的程度，所以感覺好像哪裡怪怪的。
